name: OpenAI API key
description: API key to access OpenAI servers

name: OpenAI Model
description: Model to be used for OpenAI requests

name: OpenAI Max Tokens
description: Maximum number of tokens in OpenAI response. 4096 is the maximum

name: OpenAI Temperature
description: Temperature for OpenAI response generation. It is bounded between 0 and 2

name: SelfCheckGPT BertScore Sampling Number
description: Number of generated samples for SelfCheckGPT BertScore

name: SelfCheck BertScore Threshold
description: Threshold for SelfCheck BertScore hallucination detection (0.0-1.0). Lower scores indicate hallucination.

name: SelfCheck GPT Prompt Sampling Number
description: Number of generated samples for SelfCheck GPT Prompt

name: SelfCheck Prompt Threshold
description: Threshold for SelfCheck Prompt hallucination detection (0.0-1.0). Higher scores indicate hallucination.

name: SelfCheckGPT NGram Sampling Number
description: Number of generated samples for SelfCheckGPT NGram

name: Chainpoll Polling Frequency
description: Number of times to poll the LLM

name: Chain Poll Threshold
description: Threshold for Chain Poll hallucination detection (0.0-1.0). Higher values are more likely to be hallucinated.

name: G-Eval Polling Frequency
description: Number of times to poll the LLM

name: G-Eval Threshold
description: Threshold for G-Eval hallucination detection (0.0-1.0). Lower quality scores indicate hallucination.

name: LLM Uncertainty Prompt Strategy
description: Prompting strategy for LLM Uncertainty method

name: LLM Uncertainty Threshold
description: Threshold for LLM Uncertainty hallucination detection (0.0-1.0). Lower confidence indicates hallucination.

name: RefChecker Threshold
description: Threshold for RefChecker hallucination detection (0.0-1.0). Higher contradiction ratios indicate hallucination.

name: ChatProtect Threshold
description: Threshold for ChatProtect hallucination detection (0.0-1.0). Higher inconsistency ratios indicate hallucination.

name: SNNE Threshold
description: Threshold for SNNE hallucination detection (0.0-1.0). Higher entropy indicates hallucination.
